author: Ross Burden
method: Fry the bacon for 2-3 minutes, add the butter and garlic and cook for 1 minute. Add the flour and stir well.  Gradually add the milk and cream and stir well. Add the sweetcorn and simmer until thick.  Add the clams and pour into a bowl. Garnish with chives and serve with crusty white bread.
ingredients: 2 slices streaky bacon, chopped,  1 tsp butter, melted,  1 garlic clove, chopped,  1 tsp plain flour,  150ml/¼ pint whole milk,  50ml/2fl oz double cream,  50g/1¾oz uncooked sweetcorn,  6 clams, steamed for 5 minutes (discard anyt hat don't open),  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  fresh chives, to garnish,  thick crusty white bread, to serve
